description: simple application for creating collages and compositions
details:
FotoWall is a creative tool that allows you to layout your photos or
 pictures in a personal way.

 You can add pictues, then resize, move, change colors, text, shadows,
 etc. to create your composition or collage.

 The focus of this application is on simplicity.
 use::editing, works-with::image, x11::application
